description:
You can be our housemate during your stay in this well furnished room facing morning sun rise.

This family setting of a small family with housemates is perfect for someone who is working or studying. Close to public transit, parks, activity/sports centre, shopping and restaurants. Private Parking.

neighborhood_overview: Near Algonquin College, Kanata, in a quiet and safe residential neighbourhood on a tree lined street. Surrounded by parks, recreation facility, restaurant, cafes and Pinecrest Mall. Great for walking, cycling and easy commute with public transit or access to the 417 highway.
host_about: Janice is a semi retired arts and culture educator and Garry has a background in Emergency Management and Municipal Government. The historic Gothic stone church is a family homestead that has been lovingly restored over many years. They enjoy travelling with their children around the world and showing them as much about the world as possible, connecting them to its people, nature, architecture, culture, food and art.  They believe each day holds adventures and lessons. They appreciate and value sharing their home, their knowledge and their time to help enrich the lives of those they meet. They love the outdoors, sports, music, films, and cooking together.  They are experienced hosts and have a long history with acting as host family to those new to the country and to their community. They enjoy promoting local culture, businesses, the arts and sharing tips about their Town with others so they can feel like a 'Local'.  Sharing brings people around the world closer and they appreciate the friendships they make from their travels as well as from those they've had the privilege of hosting.

name: B-Serene Bedroom with Queen Bed & Desk
description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish bedroom. The Queen bed is a high density memory foam that is forgiving but not too soft, 2 drawers for clothes & desk. 5 hooks on door to hang clothes. neighborhood_overview:
Tucked away in a serene corner of Ottawa, this neighborhood is a hidden gem for those who cherish nature and convenience. The area boasts extensive parks and lush green spaces, where tall trees sway gently in the breeze and vibrant flowers bloom in abundance. These tranquil havens are perfect for morning jogs, leisurely strolls, or simply unwinding under the shade of a maple tree.

Just a stone’s throw away, the Ottawa River flows gracefully, its banks dotted with sandy stretches that invite locals to the beach for a day of sunbathing, picnics, and playful splashes. The river’s presence adds a sense of calm to the neighborhood, and its scenic beauty is a constant reminder of the natural splendor that surrounds this community.
Convenience is key here, with grocery stores and fast-food outlets within easy reach, ensuring that daily needs and quick bites are just around the corner. Plenty of free street parking means that residents and visitors alike can come and go without
host_about: I am an artist, beekeeper, baker, grandmother, gardener and wife. My children have moved on to shape their own lives leaving my husband and I with a beautiful home we want to share with you. My home is a reflection of myself and my life’s loves and passions. I designed every aspect and painstakingly selected all my future and art to reflect my loves and passions. I embrace the Scandinavian term Hygge. It’s a concept of life and design where you bring the cozy and welcome feeling of nature from the outside in and inside out. Our home was designed to be useful, with every corner having a purpose and set to embrace Hygge.

name: Beautiful Heritage Home in the Glebe
description: Live the luxurious life at this peaceful and centrally located place. In the heart of the Glebe, one of Ottawa's most prestigious and safe areas 2 blocks from the historic Rideau Canal. Lansdowne (Go Redblacks!), Elgin, and Byward market all within walking distance. This large home, built in 1910, is in the perfect location, professionally designed and full of historic character. Have a glass of wine on the patio or take a stroll near down the Canal!
neighborhood_overview: Experience vibrant living in Ottawa's Glebe, where every cobblestone tells a story. This eclectic neighborhood exudes charm with historic architecture, boutique shops, and a lively atmosphere. Enjoy leisurely walks along the scenic canal, explore diverse culinary delights, and engage in community events. The Glebe offers a perfect blend of cultural richness and modern conveniences, creating a dynamic and welcoming environment. Whether attending local markets or immersing in its unique character, life in the Glebe is a tapestry of tradition and contemporary allure
host_about: Hi we’re Gen and Ben and were the team behind Short and Suite :) An Ottawa based Airbnb property management company! We love hosting so much we made a career out of it. ** Special pricing and the room is available if you have at least 2 years in AirBnb and at least 2 reviews.

Welcome to this tranquil and cozy room, where you'll find a twinXL-sized bed for a great night's sleep.

While you're here, feel free to hang out in our shared living areas. Whip up some veggie meals in the fully equipped kitchen.

**If you are from Ottawa please send us a message to explain the purpose of the stay before booking**
host_about:
Hi;

I am a Canadian IT Professional living in Ottawa. I mostly do contract jobs, so I travel a lot. My last job was in Miami.

I like social sciences,  and studied sociology for a while.

I have a mid-term target of visiting 40 countries. I am at only 26 now.  I adore cities that you can breathe. Open spaces, wide streets, big historical buildings. Cities in which ads on metro or streets are totally foreign to me.

name: Basement studio with private entrance and parking
description: This cozy studio offers all the essentials for an extended stay in Ottawa. It's your private haven, tastefully decorated and sparkling clean. Work from home in comfort with blazing-fast Bell Fibe internet and a big-screen 43-inch HD Google TV. Whip up any meal in the fully-equipped kitchen with a dedicated workspace. neighborhood_overview:
Woodvale-Manordale is a quiet, safe, and well-maintained neighbourhood in Ottawa's west end. Bounded by Craig Henry Drive, Greenbank Road, Woodroffe Avenue, and Hunt Club Road, it offers a clean and peaceful living environment. Established in the late 1950s and early 1960s, the neighbourhood primarily features bungalow homes.

Woodvale-Manordale boasts four parks - Manordale, Sherry Lane, Roundhay, and Ben Franklin - as well as a local fire station. The neighbourhood is served by Manordale Public School and Saint John XXIII Catholic School. Residents can enjoy nearby amenities such as the Ben Franklin soccer dome and the Nepean Sportsplex.

name: Kat House
description:
Forget your worries in this spacious and serene home; a lovely 3-storey house, built in 1949, that has been modernized but still maintains its character. You will share the space with one human and 3 felines. My home is located in an older, very safe, residential area.

In the Fall/Winter, you can enjoy the wood-burning fireplace. The house has a gorgeous sunroom, which is perfect for relaxing, as well as a yard with a BBQ, chairs, a table and umbrella for enjoying those warm summer days.
host_about:
I am a youthful, energetic woman in my mid-fifties who loves to travel and meet new people.  Since I can't travel all the time, I thought that becoming an Airbnb host would be a great compromise.

I moved to Ottawa a year ago, for a job (and I lived here in the 90's) so I have some knowledge of the city.  I strive to be more than a host; I am a source of useful information and creative ideas for making the most of your visit to Ottawa.

neighborhood_overview: Nepean, a former independent city, is now part of Ottawa in Ontario. It was first established as a township in 1792, which included the central region of Ottawa. However, in 1978, Nepean Township was recognised as a city. Nepean is geographically bordered by the Ottawa River in the north, Robertson Road to the south, the Rideau River in the east, and Herzberg to the north. Nepean had its own library organisation, police department, and fire service until its amalgamation in 2001. Before its inclusion in Ottawa, education here was governed by the Carleton Board of Education. Still, since its amalgamation, it has joined hands with the Ottawa Board of Education and become the Ottawa-Carleton District School Board. The neighbourhood has a diversified community with couples, children, singles, and older people and comprises over 180,000 residents. Nepean has been home to big-ticket industries like Nortel Networks and JDS Uniphase.

Welcome to our spacious family home in Kanata, Ontario! With ample room for everyone, you will have use of 4 bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms. Our open-concept layout ensures that you are able to enjoy the main-floor living room, chef's kitchen, and dining room areas.

Located in Kanata, we're close to attractions like the Kanata Research Park, Canadian Tire Center, South March Highlands trails, public tennis courts, and parks, promising a memorable stay for all.

We can't wait to host you!

name: Modern 2023 Home in Ottawa — Sleeps 8
description:
Welcome to our modern 2023-built home in Vanier, Ottawa! Enjoy two spacious floors featuring a fully equipped kitchen, spacious family room, and dining area. Perfect for groups of up to 8 guests, our home is just minutes away from downtown Ottawa, making it a convenient stay for your visit to the capital.

Whether you’re here for business or leisure, this stylish and contemporary space offers everything you need. Book your stay with us and experience the best of Ottawa living!
host_about:
I love to travel and see different places! Also, I enjoy hosting travelers from all around the world. Life is full of adventure and great people. Let’s live this adventure of life together and enjoy each others' company from different places all around the globe, with love and gratitude for each other.

No pets allowed. No kids.

description: Discover a perfect getaway in the heart of Hintonburg, Ottawa. name: Belle grande chambre avec toilette adjacente
description: Relax and relax in this tranquil and stylish home with access to a courtyard with terrace and garden.  Viviana and I will do everything to make your stay as pleasant as possible and we can help you  guide you to our national capital.  We are well located, in the heart of the city, 3 kilometers from By Market, Parliament and Rideau Canal .  Finally, we are in an old neighborhood that looks like a small village of yesteryear.
host_about:
I am originally from Buenos Aires and my husband is from Montreal.  I currently teach courses at the Masters level in urban planning and also work for a non-profit organisation that develops and manages social housing.  I love gardening and traveling to places in our Westphalia.  
Hi, my name is Guy, Viviana's husband.  I am currently retired and have had a beautiful career as a Tourism Techniques teacher in a technical college.  I have a degree in geography and really enjoy traveling to see and experience different natural and cultural environments.    
We moved last year to Ottawa!! This is a wonderful city!!

name: The Pizzicato: Comfort and Convenience
description:
Welcome to The Pizzicato!

Experience this newly built 3-bedroom home in Orleans, perfect for business or leisure.

Meticulously furnished for your comfort, it’s conveniently located near groceries, shopping, and just 15 minutes from downtown with convenient access to public transportation.

Nestled in a calm residential neighborhood, the home includes parking, a ping pong table, and workout equipment in the garage.

Enjoy a peaceful and convenient stay at The Pizzicato!
host_about:

description:
Be among the first to reside in this luxury 1-bedroom haven in downtown Ottawa. Fully furnished, fully equipped kitchen, premium appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, high-end finishes and panoramic city views.

Explore an array of amenities including a business center, fitness hub, theater, lounge area, sauna, all within Ottawa's newest enclave. Positioned in the Central Business District, with the Ottawa River, Parliament Hill, dining spots, and the nearby LRT "Parliament station".
neighborhood_overview:
Our suite offers an exceptional blend of convenience and luxury. Situated just steps from Parliament Hill, Rideau Shopping Centre, and the vibrant Byward Market, you'll discover a wealth of trendy cafes, restaurants, and unique shops right at your doorstep.

Guests enjoy direct access to historic Sparks Street and can explore nearby attractions such as the National Gallery of Canada and the National Arts Centre. Take in breathtaking views from our Skylounge, which overlooks Parliament Hill and the picturesque Gatineau Hills.

Whether you're walking along the scenic Rideau Canal or using the convenient light rail from Parliament Station, exploring the city is effortless. Discover the essence of urban living, where every stay promises comfort, convenience, and memorable experiences.

name: Downtown 1 Bedroom Suite
description:
Discover the best of downtown luxury in this stylish 1-bedroom condo. This location offers unparalleled convenience in the heart of Ottawa, steps away from Parliament, great dining, and LRT Parliament station.

Enjoy two upscale lounges, a business centre, fitness centre, pool table, sauna and a movie theatre. Relax in a new queen-size bed, private balcony, sectional sofa, standing desk for WFH, fully equipped kitchen, 65" smart TV+Netflix, high-end WiFi, in-suite washer/dryer and central A/C.
neighborhood_overview:
Our suite offers an exceptional blend of convenience and luxury. Situated just steps from Parliament Hill, Rideau Shopping Centre, and the vibrant Byward Market, you'll discover a wealth of trendy cafes, restaurants, and unique shops right at your doorstep.

Guests enjoy direct access to historic Sparks Street and can explore nearby attractions such as the National Gallery of Canada and the National Arts Centre. Take in breathtaking views from our Skylounge, which overlooks Parliament Hill and the picturesque Gatineau Hills.

Whether you're walking along the scenic Rideau Canal or using the convenient light rail from Parliament Station, exploring the city is effortless. Discover the essence of urban living, where every stay promises comfort, convenience, and memorable experiences.

1. Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier International Airport: Just a quick drive away, our home provides easy access to the airport. Whether you're coming or going, the close proximity will save you time and reduce travel stress.

2. Ottawa Casino: For those looking for entertainment or a bit of luck, the Ottawa Casino is nearby. Enjoy gaming, live performances, and a variety of dining options. Our home is the perfect starting point for a fun night out.

3. Downtown Ottawa: Experience the vibrant energy of Ottawa’s downtown, just a short distance away. Visit Parliament Hill, explore national museums, take a scenic walk along the Rideau Canal, or indulge in the diverse shopping and dining options in the ByWard Market. Our location makes it easy to explore all that the city has to offer.
host_about:
I've always had a passion for connecting with new people and learn from diverse cultures.

I love travelling, reading, hiking and I find joy in discovering new cultures.

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Riverside South

Home to one of Ottawa’s most desired & new communities. The neighbourhood is quiet, safe, and family-friendly. Minutes from parks, tennis courts, trails and nature walks.

Situated less than 25 minutes drive to anywhere in Ottawa, along the stunning eastern shores of the Rideau River is the community of Riverside South. Just minutes from Barrhaven Center, you can enjoy all amenities such as; restaurants, cafes, movie theatres, HomeSense/Winners, Costco, Grocery, and more.

host_about:
My husband Dan and I love construction and renovations! I am a real estate agent and my husband a general contractor. Between our 3 cottages and a couple high end properties in Ottawa, we have great experience, hosting. We do manage our rentals ourselves giving the experience an extra touch. Karita
